Class Rank

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Rank

public class Rank
extends greenfoot.Actor

This actor represents the player's current rank. It increases throughout the game, with the number component ranging from 0 to 99 and the second letter becoming the next letter in the alphabet every time the number reaches 100.

Version:
2/6/2013
Author:
Martin Silberberg

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called whenever the game environment acts or runs. Checks whether or not the player has reached a high enough rank to upgrade.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

createRank

public void createRank()
This creates a text box that keeps track of the player's rank. Keeps track of the alphabetic and numerical components of the rank.

upgrade

public void upgrade()
This method identifies when the player is presented with the choice to upgrade and creates the upgrade text box if it is appropriate. The player can upgrade when he/she reaches the rank of HC or HG.
